game.name: The Sims 3 - Movie Stuff
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Bring all of the glitz and glamour of Hollywood straight into your Sims’ homes with The Sims™ 3 Movie Stuff! Set the stage for more unique stories with distinctively themed décor, furnishings, and clothing inspired by iconic movie genres.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bring all of the glitz and glamour of Hollywood straight into your Sims’ homes with The Sims™ 3 Movie Stuff! Set the stage for more unique stories with distinctively themed décor, furnishings, and clothing inspired by iconic movie genres.
